EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Tokyo
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Tokyo.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, June 17th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/tokyo]]>
Location Pivotal Tokyo <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/tokyo]]> Roppongi Hills Mori Tower 20F 6-10-1 Roppongi Minato-ku Tokyo 106-6120 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Roppongi+Hills/@35.6604638,139.72706,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x60188b771049dc33:0x5bfe0248594cc802!8m2!3d35.6604638!4d139.7292487]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
